column3: Latest;Battambang Province:  A man stood on a landmine at 9 am on March 13
column4: according to police. The incident happened in O’Trang village
column8: a 32-year-old male was staying at a relative’s home. in the village. According to sources
column9: the victim stood on the mine as he walked to his uncle’s farm
column10: which was on an often used path.------The type of mine is reported as an old Chinese plastic type which are difficult to detect.------The victim was taken to the provincial hospital. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/807199.html
